What is the SPoRT ADAS?
What is the SPoRT ADAS?

transitioning unique NASA data and research technologies to the NWS
transitioning unique NASA data and research technologies to the NWS
page.enlisting:
• Blends surface data into a coherent analysis using ADAS: • Strength in analyzing asynoptic data sets • • METAR, buoy, Mesonet, SAO • An observation is rejected if it is: • • • • 2-km resolution captures mesoscale features • Assimilates observations from ±15 minutes from the top of every hour • Available in AWIPS at 40-45 minutes past every hour • Blends surface data into a coherent analysis using ADAS:
• Blends surface data into a coherent analysis using ADAS:

page.title:
Surface Temperature Comparison
Surface Temperature Comparison
page.normal_text:
transitioning unique NASA data and research technologies to the NWS
transitioning unique NASA data and research technologies to the NWS
page.enlisting:
• May 9, 2008 1700 UTC • Neither analysis shows obvious bulls eyes due to quality control issues • One case—may have been no questionable observations • Better resolution of SPoRT ADAS allows it to pick up sharper gradients • Especially evident in the higher terrain of eastern Alabama and western Georgia • May 9, 2008 1700 UTC
• May 9, 2008 1700 UTC

transitioning unique NASA data and research technologies to the NWS
transitioning unique NASA data and research technologies to the NWS
page.enlisting:
• • Analyses may occasionally be missing due to unavailable RUC files, • Outages due to errors in the analysis process may last for several • Contact SPoRT Liaisons Geoffrey Stano and/or Kevin Fuell if a data •

transitioning unique NASA data and research technologies to the NWS
page.enlisting:
• SPoRT ADAS has proven most useful for nighttime temperature over • SPoRT ADAS uses good quality control and 2-km resolution to pick up fine-scale features not seen in other surface analyses available in AWIPS • Let’s work together to analyze this product: feedback on where/when SPoRT ADAS provides better analysis than other available analyses • SPoRT ADAS has proven most useful for nighttime temperature over
• SPoRT ADAS has proven most useful for nighttime temperature over
